mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Laidley, Theodore Thaddeus Sobieski to Buffington, A. R.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Laidley, Theodore Thaddeus Sobieski
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lt AR Buffington Wheeling Jany, 9 1863. By Telegraph from Philadelphia 9 1863. The carbines were not sent till the fourth 4th inst for want of swivels T.T.S. Laidley Maj 13W41&65coll [page 2] Respectfully referred to Gov Pierpoint. There is the answer to a telegram of last night enquiring for capt Bourns Carbines AR Buffington Ltnr W.V.A. QM office Wheeling DSE 9th 63
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Laidley, Theodore Thaddeus Sobieski
Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Buffington, A. R.
